mainBanner.badge: Your Trusted Partner in Building a Secure and Smart Digital Future Aligned with Saudi Vision 2030
mainBanner.title: Eazy Cyber Agent
mainBanner.description: A Saudi company specialized in cybersecurity and digital solutions. We provide integrated services in artificial intelligence, big data, and cloud computing. We work with both public and private sectors to enhance digital transformation and achieve Vision 2030 goals in building a knowledge and innovation-based economy.

smeEazy.description: The SME-EAZY program is specifically designed to support small and medium enterprises, offering:
smeEazy.service2: Low cost suitable for SME budgets
smeEazy.service3: Practical training to build cybersecurity culture
smeEazy.service4: Analytical tools for effective risk management
smeEazy.note: This program aligns with entrepreneurship and startup empowerment initiatives under Vision 2030

websiteSecurity.title: Website Security Services
websiteSecurity.description: Protect your website from cyber threats with our comprehensive security solutions
websiteSecurity.malwareDesc: Advanced malware detection and removal to keep your site safe from malicious software and attacks.
websiteSecurity.cdnDesc: Fast and secure content delivery network integration for improved performance and security.
websiteSecurity.supportDesc: Round-the-clock technical support and monitoring to ensure your website stays protected.
websiteSecurity.managedDesc: Fully managed security services with regular updates, patches, and vulnerability assessments.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the first choice in the Kingdom and the region for providing innovative digital and security solutions that enable organizations to keep pace with changes and achieve digital sustainability.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Empowering organizations to build a secure and smart infrastructure using the latest artificial intelligence, big data, and cybersecurity technologies, in line with the digital transformation strategy and Saudi Vision 2030.

coreValues.title: Core Values
coreValues.description: The principles that guide our work and define our relationships with clients and partners

integrity.description: Trust is the foundation of our relationship with our clients.

innovation.description: New solutions to face future challenges.

vision2030.subtitle: Saudi Vision 2030
vision2030.title: Our Vision 2030 Alignment
vision2030.description: We believe that cybersecurity and digital innovation are two fundamental pillars of Saudi Vision 2030, so our solutions focus on:

focus1.title: Digital Transformation
focus1.description: Enabling digital transformation in government and private entities.

focus4.title: National Capacity Building

industries.subtitle: Our Expertise
industries.title: Industries We Serve
industries.description: We provide specialized cybersecurity solutions tailored to the unique needs of various sectors in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

government.title: Government Sector
government.description: Supporting digital government transformation with advanced security solutions.

banking.title: Banking & Financial Services
banking.description: Protecting financial data and ensuring compliance with banking security standards.

energy.title: Energy & Telecommunications
energy.description: Securing critical infrastructure and communications networks.

healthcare.title: Healthcare Sector
healthcare.description: Protecting patient data and ensuring medical system security.

education.title: Education & Universities
education.description: Securing educational platforms and protecting academic data.

sme.title: Small & Medium Enterprises
sme.description: Affordable and comprehensive security solutions for growing businesses.

highlight.subtitle: Industry Expertise
highlight.title: Deep Understanding of Sector-Specific Challenges
highlight.description: Our team has extensive experience working with various industries, understanding their unique security challenges and regulatory requirements.

feature1.title: Regulatory Compliance
feature1.description: Expert knowledge of industry-specific regulations including NCA, SAMA, and international standards.

feature2.title: Sector-Specific Solutions
feature2.description: Tailored security solutions designed for the unique operational requirements of each industry.

feature3.title: 24/7 Sector Support
feature3.description: Dedicated support teams with industry expertise available around the clock.

vision2030.title: Alignment with Vision 2030

focus1.title: Enabling Digital Transformation
